descriptionHtml:
You NEED Dragonborn, hearthfire and Dawnguard in other to get this mod to work. I\'ll have this fixed as soon as I can (so only the dragonborn DLC will be required.)
What the mod does.

Makes the miraak\\\'s armor set heavy.

Doesn\'t affect the light helmet version from what I know.

Miraak\'s armor now shares the same armor stats as the daedric armor 

A more suitable reward from saving Solstheim from Miraak. 

See the pictures for further details.
author: Thexxzealotxx
